NK041(di)018:1: // tshogs gsog gi rim pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i
NK041(di)018:2: sdom pa gsum gyi gso sbyong thar pa'i them skas
NK041(di)018:3: las rgyun gyi nyams len bsdus pa bzhugs so //
NK041(di)018:4: na mo rat+na tra y+aa ya /
NK041(di)018:5: dus chen bzhi'am rgyun du'ang spros pas lcogs na /
NK041(di)018:6: rjes dran drug dang phyag rgya lnga'i mdo rnams tshang
NK041(di)018:7: ba'i rgyas pa nyid ngo mtshar shin tu che bas
NK041(di)018:9: rgyun gyi nyams len lta bur spros pa bsdu bar 'dod na /
NK041(di)018:10: rten dang mchod pa'i yo byad ji ltar 'byor pa dang /
NK041(di)018:14: don dam dbyings la 'gro 'ong gnas pa bral //
NK041(di)018:15: rnam pa'i tshul las phyogs dus kun tu khyab //
NK041(di)018:16: chos rnams kun gyi gdod ma'i gnas lugs mchog /
NK041(di)018:17: sangs rgyas bla ma chos skur skyabs su mchi //
NK041(di)018:18: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs sems can sgyu ma 'dra //
NK041(di)018:19: 'khrul pa'i snang ba tsam 'di rang sangs nas //
NK041(di)018:20: ye shes ro mnyam gcig la 'god pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:21: bla ma sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgom par bya //
NK041(di)018:22: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni de
NK041(di)018:23: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
NK041(di)018:24: pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
NK041(di)018:27: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
NK041(di)018:28: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
NK041(di)018:29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'di nyid do //
NK041(di)018:30: zhes dal bus brjod la don bsam ste /
NK041(di)018:32: rgyal mchog 'dren pa sh+aakya thub pa de //
NK041(di)018:33: bdud bzhi bcom zhing skal pa drug dang ldan //
NK041(di)018:34: gnas lugs ji bzhin gzigs pa ma nor ba //
NK041(di)018:35: nyon mongs bag chags bcas pa ma lus bcom //
NK041(di)018:36: nyes skyon kun sangs shes bya thams cad la //
NK041(di)018:37: mkhyen sogs rab rgyas dus gsum ma lus mkhyen //
NK041(di)018:38: rdzu 'phrul bgrod pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs khyab //
NK041(di)018:39: rgyu mchog bsgrubs pas 'bras bu bla med brnyes //
NK041(di)018:40: las nyon sdug bsngal 'khor ba mtha' dag rig /
NK041(di)018:41: skye 'gro sems can ma lus thabs kyis 'dul //
NK041(di)018:42: khyod las lhag dang khyod mtshungs gang na'ang med //
NK041(di)018:43: kun la thar lam stan pa'i phrin las can //
NK041(di)018:44: ces pa tshig re re'i don bsam /
NK041(di)018:45: de ltar sangs rgyas kun gyi chos kyi sku //
NK041(di)018:46: rtag cing mi 'gyur yon tan kun dang ldan //
NK041(di)018:47: gdod nas nyes pa kun las grol grol ba //
NK041(di)018:48: 'khor 'das kun la rtag tu khyab par bzhugs //
NK041(di)018:49: spros pa'i mtha' rnams kun gyis rtag tu dben //
NK041(di)018:50: bdag la rgyal ba'i chos sku 'di nyid bzhugs //
NK041(di)018:51: me tog gar yod me tog dri yod ltar //
NK041(di)018:52: gzugs sku gnyis kyang bdag dang 'bral ba med //
NK041(di)018:54: 'di ltar nas bzung de nyid lan mang du bsam mo //
NK041(di)018:55: rang gi mdun nam spyi bo'am /
NK041(di)018:56: snying gar mtshan dpe thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur /
NK041(di)018:57: 'di nyid rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa yin //
NK041(di)018:58: dpal ldan bla ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)018:59: chos sku nyag gcig nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NK041(di)018:60: gsol ba 'debs so bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK041(di)018:61: chos kun rang bzhin gdod ma'i ye shes 'di //
NK041(di)018:62: dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs mchog chos kyi sku //
NK041(di)018:63: sangs rgyas kun dang ro mnyam gnyis su med //
NK041(di)018:64: bla ma chos kyi sku la gsol ba 'debs //
NK041(di)018:65: rnam rtog 'bad rtsol spros pa mi mnga' yang //
NK041(di)018:66: gang 'dul sku yi snang ba mtha' yas ston //
NK041(di)018:67: gzugs sku bshes gnyen dam pa'i rnam par shar //
NK041(di)018:68: rdo rje 'dzin dbang khyod la gsol ba 'debs //
NK041(di)018:69: rgyal ba rigs lnga gdod nas lhun grub de //
NK041(di)018:70: gzhan snang phung lnga'i tshul gyis 'gro don mdzad //
NK041(di)018:71: phung po'i rnam pas 'dul ba 'gro kun sgrol //
NK041(di)018:72: phung po gzhon mchog khyod la gsol ba 'debs //
NK041(di)018:73: chos nyid gdod ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang //
NK041(di)018:74: sems dpa' yab yum dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma //
NK041(di)018:75: 'byung bzhi dbang po sogs kyi 'dul ba la //
NK041(di)018:76: de de'i rnam par ston la gsol ba 'debs //
NK041(di)018:77: kun gyi rang bzhin ye shes spros bral las //
NK041(di)018:78: chos sku mkha' khyab ces bya gzhan yod min //
NK041(di)018:79: de nyid drin can chos rje khyod kyi thugs //
NK041(di)018:80: rdo rje 'dzin dbang khyod la gsol don dam srid gsum gdod nas rang shar te //
NK041(di)018:81: gdul bya'i snang ngor srid gsum kun tu snang //
NK041(di)018:82: don med ma yin rtag tu phan bder mdzad //
NK041(di)018:83: phrin las lhun grub khyod la gsol ba 'debs //
NK041(di)018:84: brtan g.yo kun gyi rang bzhin bla ma khyed //
NK041(di)018:85: phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kun dngos lags //
NK041(di)018:86: 'gro ba kun gyi snying por bzhugs pa de //
NK041(di)018:87: bdag gis mngon sum rtogs par byin gyis rlobs //
NK041(di)018:88: zhes bla ma sangs rgyas rjes dran 'don bsgom bya /
NK041(di)018:89: de nas sngar byas kyi nyes ltung sbyong ba'i slad du byang chub ltung bshags tshang ba dang /
NK041(di)018:91: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs
NK041(di)018:92: pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub
NK041(di)018:94: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)018:95: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas tshe 'khor ba thog
NK041(di)018:96: ma med pa nas tha ma da lta la thug
NK041(di)018:97: gi bar du nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang /
NK041(di)018:99: gti mug gi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid
NK041(di)018:100: kyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba bcu bgyis
NK041(di)018:101: pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:102: de dang nye ba lnga bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:103: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang 'gal ba bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:104: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa 'gal ba bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:105: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:106: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:107: dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang /
NK041(di)018:108: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skur pa btab pa dang /
NK041(di)018:109: pha dang ma la ma gus pa bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:110: mkhan po dang slob dpon la ma gus pa bgyis pa dang /
NK041(di)018:111: grogs tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la ma
NK041(di)018:112: gus pa bgyis pa la sogs pa mdor na mtho
NK041(di)018:113: ris dang thar pa'i gegs su gyur cing /
NK041(di)018:114: 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur pa nyes
NK041(di)018:115: pa dang ltung ba'i tshogs ci mchis pa de dag
NK041(di)018:116: thams cad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po
NK041(di)018:117: la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK041(di)018:118: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
NK041(di)018:119: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so //
NK041(di)018:122: de ltar mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis /
NK041(di)018:123: ma mthol ma bshags na de ltar ma 'gyur ba lags so //
NK041(di)018:124: so thar gyi sdom pa gso ba ni /
NK041(di)018:125: skar ma rab rib mar me dang //
NK041(di)018:126: sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang //
NK041(di)018:127: rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu //
NK041(di)018:128: 'dus byas chos rnams de ltar blta //
NK041(di)018:129: chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung //
NK041(di)018:130: de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
NK041(di)018:131: rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa //
NK041(di)018:132: dge sbyong chen pos 'di skad gsungs //
NK041(di)018:133: sdig pa ci yang mi bya zhing //
NK041(di)018:134: dge ba phun sum tshogs pa spyod //
NK041(di)018:135: rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul //
NK041(di)018:136: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
NK041(di)018:137: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa na //
NK041(di)018:138: ngag gi sdom pa legs pa yin //
NK041(di)018:139: yid kyi sdom pa legs pa na //
NK041(di)018:140: thams cad du ni sdom pa legs //
NK041(di)018:141: thams cad srung ba'i dge slong dag /
NK041(di)018:142: sdug bsngal kun las nges grol lo //
NK041(di)018:143: zhes zhi gnas gso sbyong mthar /
NK041(di)018:144: spro na don zhags kyi gzungs mdo las 'byung ba'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i gzungs ni /
NK041(di)018:145: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)018:146: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)018:147: a mo g+ha sh+ai la sam b+ha ra sam b+ha
NK041(di)018:148: ra b+ha ra b+ha ra ma h+aa shud+d+ha sa t+wa
NK041(di)018:149: pad+ma bi b+h+au shi ta b+hu dza d+ha ra d+ha
NK041(di)018:150: ra sa man+t+aa a wa lo ki te h'u phata
NK041(di)018:152: h+r+aihtree lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha p+aa
NK041(di)018:153: sha a pra ti ha ha hrihha h'u phata swa
NK041(di)018:155: gang zhig nyi ma re re bzhin gzungs 'di 'dra
NK041(di)018:156: na tshul khrims kyi nyes ltung thams cad dag cing
NK041(di)018:157: phyin chad byang chub kyi bar du tshul khrims rnam
NK041(di)018:159: de nas smon lam gdab pa ni /
NK041(di)018:160: bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la tshul
NK041(di)018:161: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams yongs
NK041(di)018:163: nyon mongs pas tshul khrims 'chal ba las byung ba'i
NK041(di)018:164: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag
NK041(di)018:165: par gyur cig / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims kyi skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK041(di)018:166: nyon mongs pas mi rdzi bar rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la gnas par gyur cig /
NK041(di)018:167: khrims kyis tshul khrims skyon med cing //
NK041(di)018:168: tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan //
NK041(di)018:169: rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis //
NK041(di)018:170: tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
NK041(di)018:171: rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te //
NK041(di)018:172: bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing //
NK041(di)018:173: tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag pa //
NK041(di)018:174: rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog /
NK041(di)018:176: de nas byang sems smon 'jug gi sdom pa bzung ba ni /
NK041(di)018:177: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
NK041(di)018:178: sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
NK041(di)018:179: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)018:181: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
NK041(di)018:182: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi //
NK041(di)018:183: chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi //
NK041(di)018:184: tshogs la'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi //
NK041(di)018:185: lan gsum gyi rten khyad par can la skyabs su 'gro /
NK041(di)018:186: ji snyed su dag sogs nas /
NK041(di)018:187: byang chub phyir bsngo'o'i bar dang /
NK041(di)018:188: 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang //
NK041(di)018:189: kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te //
NK041(di)018:190: de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag slob cing //
NK041(di)018:191: dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo //
NK041(di)018:192: dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis //
NK041(di)018:193: bsngo ba gang la mchog tu basngagasa pa des //
NK041(di)018:194: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang //
NK041(di)018:195: bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:196: zhes brjod de thabs khyad par can gyi tshogs bsags /
NK041(di)018:197: de nas byang chub sems rin po cher blo sbyang ba'i slad du /
NK041(di)018:198: lus dang de bzhin longs spyod dang //
NK041(di)018:199: dus gsum dge ba'i dngos po yang //
NK041(di)018:200: sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
NK041(di)018:201: phongs pa med pa gtang bar bya //
NK041(di)018:202: sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang //
NK041(di)018:203: nam mkha' bzhin du rtag par yang //
NK041(di)018:204: sems can dpag tu med pa yi //
NK041(di)018:205: rnam mang nyer 'tsho'i rgyu yang shog /
NK041(di)018:206: de bzhin nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i //
NK041(di)018:207: sems can khams ni rnam kun tu //
NK041(di)018:208: thams cad mya ngan 'das bar du //
NK041(di)018:209: bdag ni nyer 'tsho'i rgyur yang shog /
NK041(di)018:210: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
NK041(di)018:211: sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
NK041(di)018:212: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK041(di)018:213: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung
NK041(di)018:214: ste ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi
NK041(di)018:215: bar du / ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis //
NK041(di)018:216: byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa dang //
NK041(di)018:217: byang chub sems pa'i bslab pa la //
NK041(di)018:218: de dag rim bzhin gnas pa ltar //
NK041(di)018:219: de bzhin 'gro la phan don du //
NK041(di)018:220: byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
NK041(di)018:221: de bzhin du ni bslab pa la'ang //
NK041(di)018:222: rim pa bzhin du bslab par bgyi //
NK041(di)018:223: zhes lan gsum gyis smon 'jug gi sems bskyed blang /
NK041(di)018:224: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
NK041(di)018:225: mi yi srid pa legs par thob //
NK041(di)018:226: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
NK041(di)018:227: sangs rgyas sras su bdag deng 'gyur //
NK041(di)018:228: da ni bdag gi ci nas kyang //
NK041(di)018:229: rigs dang mthun pa'i las brtsams te //
NK041(di)018:230: skyon med btsun pa'i rigs 'di la //
NK041(di)018:231: rnyog par mi 'gyur de ltar bya //
NK041(di)018:232: bdag gis de ring skyob pa thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)018:233: spyan sngar 'gro ba bde gshegs nyid dang ni //
NK041(di)018:234: bar du bde la mgron du bos zin gyi //
NK041(di)018:235: lha dang lha min la sogs dga' bar gyis //
NK041(di)018:236: kun nas dge ba bzang po spyod pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:237: 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyod par bgyi //
NK041(di)018:238: ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar //
NK041(di)018:239: de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi //
NK041(di)018:241: na ma stree ya d+hi ka n+aam /
NK041(di)018:242: sarba ta th+aa ga t+aa n+aam /
NK041(di)018:243: sarba tra a pra ti ha ta bsti d+harma t+aa ba l+ai n+aam /
NK041(di)018:246: b+aa sti sha sa ni ha ra ha ra sma ra sma ra na pi ga t+aa r+aa ga /
NK041(di)018:247: bud+d+ha d+harma te sa ra sa ra sa ma sa ya /
NK041(di)018:250: ga ga na ma h+aa ba ra lak+sha ni dz+wa la dz+wa la na s+aa ga re s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)018:252: de nas rdo rje theg pa la thun mong ma
NK041(di)018:253: yin pa 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i lugs kyi
NK041(di)018:254: bsags sbyong sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa dang dam
NK041(di)018:257: chos dbyings rnam dag lhun grub chen po nas //
NK041(di)018:258: dpag yas thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul 'gyed pa'i lha //
NK041(di)018:259: kun bzang rigs lnga skyabs gnas thams cad kun //
NK041(di)018:260: 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs shing bzhugs su gsol //
NK041(di)018:261: gdod nas byang chub rdo rje snying po'i gdung //
NK041(di)018:262: dkon mchog gsum dang yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
NK041(di)018:263: chos skyong srung ma dam can gter bdag rnams //
NK041(di)018:264: gnas 'dir byon la bdag sogs byin gyis rlobs //
NK041(di)018:265: badz+ra sa m+aa ya dzah sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK041(di)018:266: rol mo dbyangs snyan yid 'ong bdud rtsi'i chus //
NK041(di)018:267: yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshogs la 'khrus gsol zhing //
NK041(di)018:268: na bza' rin chen rgyan mchog 'di phul ba //
NK041(di)018:269: 'gro kun skyon bral yon tan rdzogs par shog /
NK041(di)018:270: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi shi ka sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h'u /
NK041(di)018:271: h'u tram h+r+aih+aah k+aa ya bi sho d+ha na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)018:272: snang srid rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing khams 'dir //
NK041(di)018:273: kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin phung 'di phul bas //
NK041(di)018:274: nam mkha'i mtha' klas gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun //
NK041(di)018:275: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par shog /
NK041(di)018:276: badz+ra ar+g+ham p+aa d+yam push+pe d+h+au pe +aa lo ke
NK041(di)018:277: g+han+d+he nee bi d+ye shab+ta p+au dza me g+ha sa
NK041(di)018:278: mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye +aahmh'u /
NK041(di)018:279: mngon par byang chub chos sku dag pa las //
NK041(di)018:280: mdzad pa rnam 'phrul sgyu ma'i skur bzhengs pa //
NK041(di)018:281: bla ma mchog gsum yi dam mkha' 'gro dang //
NK041(di)018:282: dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK041(di)018:283: rdo rje'i gdung 'tshob rnal 'byor tshogs rnams kyi //
NK041(di)018:284: 'gal 'khrul nyams chag dus 'dir bskang gyur cig /
NK041(di)018:285: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol ba dang //
NK041(di)018:286: bla med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
NK041(di)018:287: tsakra rat+na p+au dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma h'u s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)018:288: 'dir man+dala tshom bu so bdun ma rgyas par bkod cing 'bul /
NK041(di)018:289: rin chen man+dala yid 'ong mchod pa'i sprin //
NK041(di)018:290: 'dod dgu'i 'byor tshogs dpag med dang ldan pa //
NK041(di)018:291: dpag yas nam mkha'i rgyan gyur 'di phul bas //
NK041(di)018:292: 'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)018:293: 'og min bde chen rin chen gzhal yas khang //
NK041(di)018:294: sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyi bla bre can //
NK041(di)018:295: nam mkha' gang bar dmigs te phul ba yis //
NK041(di)018:296: 'gro kun longs sku'i zhing la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)018:297: 'od gsal lhun grub ye shes rigs lnga'i zhing //
NK041(di)018:298: sku dang thig les ye nas brgyan pa 'di //
NK041(di)018:299: rang snang dag pas legs par phul ba yis //
NK041(di)018:300: kun bzang chos sku'i zhing la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)018:302: de nas yan lag brgyad pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom bzung dngos ni /
NK041(di)018:303: gdod ma'i dbyings su mngon par byang chub nas //
NK041(di)018:304: 'khor 'das kun gyi thog ma'i mgon po mchog /
NK041(di)018:305: kun bzang rigs lnga zhi khro bla mar bcas //
NK041(di)018:306: 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs shing bzhugs su gsol //
NK041(di)018:307: yon tan 'bar ba'i dbyings su lhun rdzogs te //
NK041(di)018:308: sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i lha //
NK041(di)018:309: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dang //
NK041(di)018:310: dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)018:311: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyi rnam sprul pa'i //
NK041(di)018:312: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin rgya mtshos mchod //
NK041(di)018:313: thog med dus nas da lta'i bar nyid du //
NK041(di)018:314: srid 'gro nyam ngar yun ring 'khor ba na //
NK041(di)018:315: lus ngag yid kyis mi dge ci bgyis pa //
NK041(di)018:316: 'gal 'khrul nyams chag thams cad mthol lo bshags //
NK041(di)018:317: rdzogs sangs rgyas mgon byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK041(di)018:318: 'phags gnyis so so skye bo ma lus pa'i //
NK041(di)018:319: dus gsum dge ba bgyid dang bgyid stsal dang //
NK041(di)018:320: bgyis pa gyur pa kun la yi rang ngo //
NK041(di)018:321: glo bur nyon mongs dang ldan sems can rnams //
NK041(di)018:322: khams de'i rang bzhin dag par mthong bya'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:323: phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa yi //
NK041(di)018:324: chos kyi 'khor lo rmad byung bskor du gsol //
NK041(di)018:325: sangs rgyas 'jig rten nyi ma gang du byon //
NK041(di)018:326: 'gro ba'i gnyen gyur sras dang bcas pa kun //
NK041(di)018:327: sdig pa'i mun nag 'thibs po bsal slad du //
NK041(di)018:328: 'khor ba ji srid sgron me mdzad par gsol //
NK041(di)018:329: yon tan dge 'os rgyal ba'i byang chub mchog /
NK041(di)018:330: skye dgu kun gyis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:331: bsod nams phung po yongs su bsngo bgyis pas //
NK041(di)018:332: 'gro kun thar pa'i grong du phyin par shog /
NK041(di)018:334: rdzogs sangs rin chen dag pa'i sems nyid dang //
NK041(di)018:335: rtogs pa'i dri ma rab bral dam pa'i chos //
NK041(di)018:336: brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing //
NK041(di)018:337: sred dang bral ba rnams la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK041(di)018:338: deng nas bdag ni 'gro kun nyer 'tsho'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:339: mgon rnams 'bangs su bdag nyid 'bul lags kyis //
NK041(di)018:340: brtse ba'i thugs rjes bzhes par mdzad du gsol //
NK041(di)018:341: byams pa'i zhal bzang dus 'dir gzigs nas kyang //
NK041(di)018:342: 'gal 'khrul nyams chag thams cad bskang du gsal //
NK041(di)018:343: rnal 'byor dbang phyug ye shes mthar phyin nas //
NK041(di)018:344: 'gro la phan mdzad thugs rjes dbang bsgyur zhing //
NK041(di)018:345: srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gyur gcig pu pa //
NK041(di)018:346: lha'i lha khyod bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)018:347: bde bar gshegs pa'i sprul pa rgya mtsho dang //
NK041(di)018:348: rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub pa'i tshogs chen po //
NK041(di)018:349: lha dang lha min gsang sngags dam tshig can //
NK041(di)018:350: kun nas 'dus pa rnams kyang dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)018:351: bdag ni rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod dang //
NK041(di)018:352: 'dod pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa ma lags te //
NK041(di)018:353: 'gro la snying brtse kho nas don brtson pas //
NK041(di)018:354: srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gyur gcig tu 'tshal //
NK041(di)018:355: 'di la kun mkhyen khyod du dpang du gsol //
NK041(di)018:356: mgon po ye shes sgrib pa mi mnga' bas //
NK041(di)018:357: khyod kyis bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen //
NK041(di)018:358: 'phags pa'i spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas pa //
NK041(di)018:359: nyams par mi bgyid mgon khyod bslu ma lags //
NK041(di)018:360: de nas bdag ni khe dang grags la sogs //
NK041(di)018:361: g.yo dang zang zing sems ni gtan spangs nas //
NK041(di)018:362: gzhan don sgrub pa gcig pu'i sems bzhag ste //
NK041(di)018:363: rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po bdag gis brtsam //
NK041(di)018:364: kun tu bzang po bla na med pa yi //
NK041(di)018:365: byang chub mchog tu bdag gis sems bskyed bya //
NK041(di)018:366: don dam dang ni kun rdzob byang chub sems //
NK041(di)018:367: deng nas tshul bzhin yongs su bzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:368: srog chags thams cad gal te 'dus gyur nas //
NK041(di)018:369: dum bu stong du bdag gi lus gtubs kyang //
NK041(di)018:370: byang chub sems mchog shes rab snying rje dang //
NK041(di)018:371: yi dam rgyal ba khyod ni yongs mi btang //
NK041(di)018:372: ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba sras bcas dang //
NK041(di)018:373: rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams kyis //
NK041(di)018:374: phyi nang gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig dang //
NK041(di)018:375: sdom pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho bzung ba ltar //
NK041(di)018:376: deng nas bdag kyang lam chen der zhugs te //
NK041(di)018:377: 'gro la phan phyir de dag gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:378: gdod nas ma skyes mkha' ltar rnam dag cing //
NK041(di)018:379: mi 'gyur lhun grub rang byung 'od gsal ba //
NK041(di)018:380: ji bzhin ma bcos chos nyid don bsgoms te //
NK041(di)018:381: chos sku yangs pa chen po'i mkha' dbyings las //
NK041(di)018:382: kun bzang don gyi dam tshig gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:383: bde bar gshegs pa rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK041(di)018:384: sdom dang chos sdud sems can byed byed cing //
NK041(di)018:385: byang chub snying po rang la mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:386: chos kyi 'khor lo'i rdzas kyang gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:387: mi 'gyur rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK041(di)018:388: rang bzhin bskyed rdzogs don las mi 'da' zhing //
NK041(di)018:389: rdo rje slob dpon mchog tu bkur ba dang //
NK041(di)018:390: thabs dang shes rab rang la mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:391: rdo rje dril bu'i rdzas kyang gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:392: bsam 'phel rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK041(di)018:393: sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i 'gro don skyong ba dang //
NK041(di)018:394: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs byed cing //
NK041(di)018:395: lhun grub yon tan rang la mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:396: nor bu rin chen rdzas kyang bzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:397: ma chags pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK041(di)018:398: phyi nang gsang ba'i chos rnams yongs bzung zhing //
NK041(di)018:399: 'gro la tshad med snying rje chags pa dang //
NK041(di)018:400: skyon bral chos nyid rang la mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:401: yid 'ong pad+ma mchog kyang gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:402: sna tshogs las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig tu //
NK041(di)018:403: theg gsum sdom pa mtha' yas bzung ba dang //
NK041(di)018:404: de nyid lhun grub rang la mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:405: rgya gram ral gri mchog kyang gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:406: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i dam tshig tu //
NK041(di)018:407: zung 'jug lam du thams cad blang ba dang //
NK041(di)018:408: spang blang med pa'i rol pa mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:409: kha t+wam thod pa cang te'u gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:410: mdor na gang gis 'khor ba rnams sbyangs pa //
NK041(di)018:411: phung po skye mched khams rnams dag byed cing //
NK041(di)018:412: dbang po yul dang nyon mongs rnams sbyangs pa //
NK041(di)018:413: sku lnga ye shes lnga dang gsung lnga dang //
NK041(di)018:414: yon tan phrin las rigs lnga bsgrub pa'i rdzas //
NK041(di)018:415: nang gi dgongs spyod rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang //
NK041(di)018:416: phyi rol dam rdzas 'dod yon thabs chen lnga //
NK041(di)018:417: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa dang //
NK041(di)018:418: rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnam lnga rnams //
NK041(di)018:419: rdo rje mchog bsgrub sku gsung thugs gsum dang //
NK041(di)018:420: shes dang mi spang dang du blang ba dang //
NK041(di)018:421: sgrub dang spyad par bya ba lnga lnga ste //
NK041(di)018:422: nyi shu rtsa lnga rtsa ba yan lag bcas //
NK041(di)018:423: gsang sngags rdo rje snying po'i sdom pa kun //
NK041(di)018:424: deng nas brtsams te bdag gis gzung bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:425: gang la brten nas srid pa rnam sbyang zhing //
NK041(di)018:426: zhi bar thar pa dam pa'i lha chos kun //
NK041(di)018:427: 'gro ba'i don du bdag gis yongs su gzung //
NK041(di)018:428: srid zhir mi gnas byang chub mchog zhugs te //
NK041(di)018:429: dkyil 'khor dbang phyug rdo rje slob dpon dang //
NK041(di)018:430: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun mchod pa dang //
NK041(di)018:431: tshogs gnyis brtson pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho bsgrub //
NK041(di)018:432: 'gro la snying brtses phan pa mchog tu bya //
NK041(di)018:433: gnod par mi bya brnyas par yongs mi bya //
NK041(di)018:434: gcig pur zhi bar don du mi gnyer zhing //
NK041(di)018:435: gzhan don yang dag sgrub la brtson pa yis //
NK041(di)018:436: rang gzhan thar pa'i sgo ni dbye bar bgyid //
NK041(di)018:437: 'dir rdor sems yig brgya lan gsum brjod /
NK041(di)018:438: de nas thun mong ma yin pa'i smon lam gdab pa ni /
NK041(di)018:439: hoh mtha' yas theg pa chen po'i lam chen du //
NK041(di)018:440: ma lus 'gro kun bdag gis yongs drangs te //
NK041(di)018:441: thams cad byang chub mchog la rab bkod nas //
NK041(di)018:442: kun bzang chos rje bla med sa thob shog /
NK041(di)018:443: thar lam byang chub snying por bdag zhugs nas //
NK041(di)018:444: ji srid bla med go 'phang mchis kyi bar //
NK041(di)018:445: tshe rabs gang dang gang skyes de dang der //
NK041(di)018:446: blo ldan rig bzang nga rgyal med pa dang //
NK041(di)018:447: snying brtse mchog gyur bla ma la gus shing //
NK041(di)018:448: 'gro ba'i don rnams bsgrub la mkhas pa dang //
NK041(di)018:449: dpal mgon bla ma rab tu mnyes byed shog /
NK041(di)018:450: deng nas byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
NK041(di)018:451: bcom ldan rdo rje kun tu bzang po dang //
NK041(di)018:452: yi dam dkyil 'khor srung ma dam tshig can //
NK041(di)018:453: bka' gsang rmad byung bla na med pa dang //
NK041(di)018:454: rdo rje mched lcam rnams dang mi 'bral zhing //
NK041(di)018:455: g.yar dam gcig pa gtan du mi 'bral shog /
NK041(di)018:456: sgrub mchog bdag la bar chad mi 'byung zhing //
NK041(di)018:457: nyi mtshan brtson pas thar lam mthar phyin nas //
NK041(di)018:458: bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i rig 'dzin gral 'khod de //
NK041(di)018:459: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:460: bcom ldan kun bzang yi dam dkyil 'khor lha //
NK041(di)018:461: sa ler mthong bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang //
NK041(di)018:462: blta bar 'dod dang 'bri bar 'dod na yang //
NK041(di)018:463: sgrib med mgon po mngon sum mthong bar shog /
NK041(di)018:464: gang tshe bskyed rdzogs bsnyen bsgrub spyod pa na //
NK041(di)018:465: dgongs spyod ting 'dzin rgya mtsho mthar phyin te //
NK041(di)018:466: rdo rje mchog gsum grub pa'i phrin las bzhi //
NK041(di)018:467: brtsams pa tsam gyis mngon du 'grub par shog /
NK041(di)018:468: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' mnyam zhing rnams kyi //
NK041(di)018:469: sems can ma lus byang chub thob bya'i phyir //
NK041(di)018:470: kun bzang spyod pa ci 'drar bdag gyur te //
NK041(di)018:471: rgyal sras byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas shog /
NK041(di)018:472: sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal bdag la smin //
NK041(di)018:473: bdag dge sems can rnams la yongs smin te //
NK041(di)018:474: 'gro kun bde gshegs byang chub mchog thob nas //
NK041(di)018:475: gzhan don spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas shog /
NK041(di)018:476: bdag gis brtson pas mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK041(di)018:477: srid las rnam grol 'khor ba stong pa na //
NK041(di)018:478: bdag kyang byang chub dam pa gnyis thob nas //
NK041(di)018:479: chos sku kun tu bzang dang dbyer med shog /
NK041(di)018:480: tshe rabs kun tu 'gro ba'i gnyen gyur nas //
NK041(di)018:481: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med pa yis //
NK041(di)018:482: 'gro ba'i don du 'dod dgu'i char 'bebs pa //
NK041(di)018:483: nor bu rin chen mchog dang mtshungs par shog /
NK041(di)018:484: dbang bcu mngon shes rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang //
NK041(di)018:485: gzungs dang rnam thar yon tan mchog grub nas //
NK041(di)018:486: gzhan gyis ma thul 'gro rnams 'dul byed cing //
NK041(di)018:487: thams cad byang chub mchog la 'god par shog /
NK041(di)018:488: nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gyur pa'i 'gro ba la //
NK041(di)018:489: dam chos rin chen bdud rtsi'i char phabs nas //
NK041(di)018:490: chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis //
NK041(di)018:491: skye dgu thams cad bde ba 'god par shog /
NK041(di)018:492: gsang sngags rgyal po bla med mchog grub nas //
NK041(di)018:493: mtha' yas zhing du rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho dang //
NK041(di)018:494: mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro bas //
NK041(di)018:495: gsang sngags spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas shog /
NK041(di)018:496: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas rnams bgrod pa dang //
NK041(di)018:497: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing rnams lta ba dang //
NK041(di)018:498: dur khrod brgyad dang tshan+d+ho la sogs par //
NK041(di)018:499: mkha' 'gro rnams dang skal ba mnyam par shog /
NK041(di)018:500: mngon shes mang pos gdul bya'i rgyud mkhyen cing //
NK041(di)018:501: ting 'dzin mang pos ye shes lus grub ste //
NK041(di)018:502: rig 'dzin mang pos gsang sngags dngos grub brnyes //
NK041(di)018:503: sa mchog mang pos dkyil 'khor 'grub par shog /
NK041(di)018:504: 'gro blo'i rim pa ji bzhin dbang po'i chos //
NK041(di)018:505: sna tshogs theg pa'i chos kyi char bsil bas //
NK041(di)018:506: gnas skabs so so'i re ba yongs bskangs te //
NK041(di)018:507: mthar thug theg pa'i rgyal por 'jug par shog /
NK041(di)018:508: mkha' khyab yon tan yidabazhina sprin tshogs las //
NK041(di)018:509: dngos grub rnam pa mang po'i char bab cing //
NK041(di)018:510: gang la ci 'dul de la der snang bas //
NK041(di)018:511: mkha' khyab sems can smin pa'i mthu ldan shog /
NK041(di)018:512: nam zhig 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa'i tshe //
NK041(di)018:513: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dpag med kyis //
NK041(di)018:514: mchod pa'i sprin phung thogs pas mdun bsus nas //
NK041(di)018:515: 'og min mkha' spyod gnas su phyin par shog /
NK041(di)018:516: skad cig de la chos sku mthar phyin nas //
NK041(di)018:517: gdod nas rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs //
NK041(di)018:518: kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag po ru //
NK041(di)018:519: rdo rje bde ba chen po'i sa thob shog /
NK041(di)018:520: gzhon nu bum pa sku yi zhing khams su //
NK041(di)018:521: rin chen sbubs la brtan pa mthar phyin nas //
NK041(di)018:522: gzugs sku'i rol pas gdul bya'i 'jig rten du //
NK041(di)018:523: sprul pa rnam pa mang po 'gyed par shog /
NK041(di)018:524: ye shes chos kyi sku dang dbyer med cing //
NK041(di)018:525: thog ma dang ni tha ma med pa'i bdag /
NK041(di)018:526: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i mkha' dbyings su //
NK041(di)018:527: ma 'bad bzhin du ngang gis phyin par shog /
NK041(di)018:528: rin chen 'od gsal dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK041(di)018:529: rang rig rdo rje sems dpa'i don mthong nas //
NK041(di)018:530: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i phrin las rlabs chen gyis //
NK041(di)018:531: 'gro kun phyam gcig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog /
NK041(di)018:532: gser gyi nyi ma rnams ni klong du thim //
NK041(di)018:533: 'bar ba'i 'od zer nye ba zhi ba na //
NK041(di)018:534: rgyal ba'i dbang po dri med mchog gi yum //
NK041(di)018:535: rnam dag yangs pa chen po'i don mthong shog /
NK041(di)018:536: dbang bzhis smin pa'i rig pa byang chub sems //
NK041(di)018:537: 'od gsal snang ba bzhi po mngon gyur nas //
NK041(di)018:538: gdos bcas phung po 'od kyi skur grol te //
NK041(di)018:539: 'pho ba chen pos gzhan don 'grub par shog /
NK041(di)018:540: 'ching byed lus kyi rgya las ma grol bar //
NK041(di)018:541: gang zhig 'chi 'pho nang gi sdug bsngal med //
NK041(di)018:542: bar do'i 'od gsal dam pa mngon gyur nas //
NK041(di)018:543: lhun grub sa la gtan srid zin par shog /
NK041(di)018:544: gal te srid pa bar do mthong gyur na //
NK041(di)018:545: skad cig de la rang snang 'jigs bral te //
NK041(di)018:546: mngon dga' la sogs dag pa'i zhing bgrod nas //
NK041(di)018:547: mngon par byang chub mdzad pa mtha' yas shog /
NK041(di)018:548: sa mchog 'od gsal rdo rje rtse mo ru //
NK041(di)018:549: bdag cag rdo rje rnal 'byor zhugs so 'tshal //
NK041(di)018:550: bar chad med lam brtan pa mthar phyin nas //
NK041(di)018:551: kun bzang che mchog he ru ka thob shog /
NK041(di)018:552: chos dbyings rnam dag rnam snang bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)018:553: dbang phyug chen po lha yi lha gyur pa //
NK041(di)018:554: stug po'i rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyan //
NK041(di)018:555: bde gshegs rigs kyi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:556: me long rnam dag mi spyod bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)018:557: grags pa mthar phyin lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NK041(di)018:558: mngon dag'i rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyan //
NK041(di)018:559: rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:560: kun rtog rnam dag dpag med bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)018:561: bde chen dbang phyug lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NK041(di)018:562: bde ldan rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyan //
NK041(di)018:563: pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:564: mnyam nyid rnam dag rin chen bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)018:565: yon tan mthar phyin lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NK041(di)018:566: dpal ldan rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyan //
NK041(di)018:567: rin chen rigs kyi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:568: bya grub rnam dag don yod bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)018:569: phrin las mthar phyin lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NK041(di)018:570: las rab rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyan //
NK041(di)018:571: las kyi rigs kyi dngos grub thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:572: rang rig rnam dag kun bzang bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)018:573: 'khor 'das kun gyi lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NK041(di)018:574: gdod ma'i rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyan //
NK041(di)018:575: thams cad lhun grub dngos grub thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:577: dkon mchog rin chen gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK041(di)018:578: dge ba 'di yis nye bar mtshon nas ni //
NK041(di)018:579: sems can rnams kyis dus gsum bsags pa yi //
NK041(di)018:580: zag bcas zag med zug 'jug dge ba rnams //
NK041(di)018:581: bla med byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi //
NK041(di)018:582: 'gro kun thams cad mkhyen pa thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:583: chos dbyings byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK041(di)018:584: bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyis //
NK041(di)018:585: dus gsum bsags dang rtogs pa yis //
NK041(di)018:586: 'gro drug sems can ma lus pa //
NK041(di)018:587: sku lnga yongs rdzogs sangs rgyas thob par shog /
NK041(di)018:589: shis brjod zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'am /
NK041(di)018:590: dkyus su bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan /
NK041(di)018:591: ces sogs brjod pas legs par 'grub pa'o //
NK041(di)018:592: zhes pa'ang dbu mdzad bla ma karma rat+nasa gzhan phan
NK041(di)018:593: ched du spar chung zur du bsgrubs pa'i thugs stsol
NK041(di)018:594: mdzad pa'i tshe / karma ngag dbang yon tan rgya
NK041(di)018:595: mtshos rgyas pa'i gsham las byung ba'i rtsa tho ltar
NK041(di)018:596: khol phyung du bsdebs pa dge legs 'phel //
